questions.text: Do you have a written mission referencing social or environmental goals?
Does the board regularly review ESG KPIs and non-financial metrics?
Do you publish an annual impact or sustainability report?
Are there policies to prevent conflicts of interest among leadership?
Average training hours per employee per year
Fair compensation, benefits, and paid leave provided?
Formal process for worker feedback and grievance resolution?
Access to health and safety training?
Flexible working arrangements or accommodations offered?
Employee ownership, profit sharing, or representation?
Prioritize local hiring or diversity in recruitment?
Use diverse or local suppliers?
Contribute to charitable donations or community initiatives?
Are suppliers treated fairly and ethically?
Ongoing initiatives benefiting local communities?
Track energy consumption and emissions?
Targets in place to reduce environmental impacts?
Products/services incorporate sustainability?
Measure customer outcomes related to social/environmental impact?
Privacy, accessibility, and responsible marketing practices implemented?
